programme.title: Le champ des rêves
programme.desc:
(4) U.S. 1989. An Iowa farmer hears a voice telling him to build a baseball diamond in the middle of his corn field.
Réalisation : P.A. Robinson Phil Alden Robinson
Avec : Kevin Costner Amy Madigan James Earl Jones

programme.title: Level Playing Field
programme.desc: Hit the mat in Montreal with Canadian Para Judo star Priscilla Gagné. Then, Greg Westlake visits Holland Bloorview Kids Rehabilitation Hospital in Toronto to witness how they use sport as a tool in recovery.

programme.title: #IGotThis
programme.desc: (S04EP06) In this episode: Parenting with a disability. Surgery leaves a father of five partially paralyzed; find out how he and his wife navigate this new reality.

programme.title: Double Tap TV
programme.desc: (S05EP33) We speak with Be My Eyes, who are using ChatGPT AI to enhance their service, and a representative from Microsoft about their Bing AI technology.

programme.title: Mind Your Own Business
programme.desc: (S01EP08) Taylor became a parapalegic after an injury training as a gymnast. She has built up an online tea brand with impressive results. With the opening of her first café imminent, she has questions for the mentors.

programme.title: That Sex Show
programme.desc: (S01EP02) Rachele uncovers true stories about the journey to discovering one's true self while investigating the intersection between sexuality, gender identity and disability.

programme.title: Fashion Dis
programme.desc:
(S01EP06) Tai is about to graduate high school and the world is his oyster. He's a lover of all things art, with a passion for fashion, but still has a lot of questions before he picks his post-secondary path.
Année : 2022

programme.title: Rendez-vous politique surprise
programme.desc:
NDP MPP Taras Natyshak and Conservative MP Dave Epp explore possible solutions to the problems faced by migrant workers in Southwestern Ontario, including COVID-19 outbreaks and living conditions that some critics call inhumane.
Année : 2017

programme.title: Dish With Mary
programme.desc:
(S03EP07) In the episode of Dish with Mary, Mary visits Chef Nuit Regular in Toronto. Chef Nuit shares her story of leaving Thailand to immigrate to Canada with her Canadian husband, Jeff, where she brings the flavors of Northern Thailand to her customers.
Année : 2017

programme.title: Eyesoforst-l Job
programme.desc:
(S03EP09) Fashion designers Robbie and Cindy bring an antique sewing machine into the workshop, which Chris and Alex help turn into a desk with a lamp. Then, Alex and Chris get their hands dirty in a pottery lesson.
Année : 2017

programme.title: Les quatre sens
programme.desc:
(S03EP06) Explore all things pickled as Chef Amira Becarevic joins Carl and Christine in the kitchen.
Année : 2017

programme.title: Our Community
programme.desc:
In 2007, Donalda Jones started REALM, a non-profit charity to help others benefit from a disability network. Since then, REALM has helped over 40 individuals of all abilities carry out their dreams.
Année : 2017

programme.title: Eyesoforst-l Job
programme.desc:
(S03EP07) Alex, Chris, and a local gym owner make a peg board for exercising. Later, Chris finds an old table on the side of the road perfect for making a poker table out of!
Année : 2017

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc:
(S05EP07) When Detective Murdoch investigates the abduction of Lucille Messing, a shy, churchgoing librarian, he's stunned to discover his friend, Anna Fulford, working at the library under an alias. Murdoch has grave fears for her safety.
Année : 2008
Avec : Hélène Joy (Dr. Julia Ogden) Thomas Craig (Inspector Brackenreid) Jonny Harris (Constable Crabtree) Lisa Faulkner (Anna Fulford) Yannick Bisson (William Murdoch)

programme.title: NOW with Dave Brown
programme.desc:
Join Dave Brown as he discusses the latest news, sports, entertainment and current events through a disability lens.
Année : 2008

programme.title: Our Community
programme.desc:
This episode of Our Community explores the W. Ross Macdonald School's renowned music program. We'll find out why it is so highly regarded by the community.

programme.title: L'appel du coeur
programme.desc:

programme.title: Heartland
programme.desc:
